author.name: Conchobar mac Dubhthach
author.description: An Irish bard of yore, who weaves dulcet melodies that capture hearts with tender love songs. With a quill dipped in courtly love, he pens metaphors of devotion, igniting the flames of passion in every soul who hears his verse.

newsMedieval:
Ye dollar weak, a truth declared by sages,
DHF speaks in our tumultuous ages.
In yon first half, an interest cut looms,
In market's heart, uncertainty blooms.

Fear not, dear folk, for Goldman Sachs proclaims,
That core bonds keep steadied our financial games.
Through unrest vast and growth's fickle trends,
Such assets yield a buffer that defends.

Alas, in Britain's fertile, teeming land,
The public coffers stretch to meet demand.
Chancellor Hunt, scarce room to wield his tax,
For Autumn's statement bears a heavy axe.

feedItems.title: Dollar Weakens as Market Ponders Fed Rate Cuts in 1H
feedItems.description: The U.S. dollar is trading weaker as investors ponder the possibility of a first interest-rate cut by the Federal Reserve in the first half of 2024, said DHF Capital.

feedItems.title: Holding Core Bonds Makes Sense Amid Growth Concerns, Says Goldman Sachs AM
feedItems.description: Core fixed income assets can help balance portfolios through episodes of geopolitical instability and growth volatility, given higher yields can provide a potential buffer, Goldman Sachs Asset Management said.

feedItems.title: U.K. Public-Sector Borrowing Climbs
feedItems.description: U.K. public-sector borrowing was higher than expected in October, an indication that Chancellor Jeremy Hunt will find little headroom to pass tax cuts in Wednesday’s autumn budget statement.

author.name: Æthelred the Skald
author.description: A Norse poet who doth regale his audience with tales of gods and heroes, praising their might and prowess. He references Norse mythology and history in his poems. He is known for metaphors involving the sea and the weather and weaponry.

newsMedieval:
In lands that belong to the Eastern Raven,
Carriages of iron, by the tempest wrought,
See sales bloom forth, a hundred score times seven,
Driven by the winds of change in foreign port.

In the dance of commerce, Stellantis bold,
Makes pact with CATL, their coffers to enrich,
Batteries for the carriages, traded for gold,
Ready their axe, for a new venture to pitch.

Yet, in the East where the dragon doth reign,
Nikkei edges lower, a warrior wearied by fight,
Falls to the strength of the yen, a chain,
Dimming the sun, casting the land in blight.

feedItems.title: EU New Car Sales Rise, Boosted by EVs
feedItems.description: New car registrations in Europe increased 15% in October, driven by demand in France, Italy and Spain, and a 36% rise in fully-electric vehicle sales.

feedItems.title: Stellantis, CATL Agree Battery Supply Deal
feedItems.description: Stellantis has signed a memorandum of understanding with CATL for the supply of EV batteries in the European market, which could lead to a joint venture with equivalent contributions.

feedItems.title: Nikkei Edges 0.1% Lower Amid JPY Strength
feedItems.description: Japan’s Nikkei Stock Average edged 0.1% lower to close at 33354.14 amid JPY strength, which hurts the overseas earnings of Japanese exporters.

author.name: Guillemette de Ventadour
author.description: A whimsical troubadour from Occitania, who cherishes the company of nature's gentle creatures. She often includes metaphors of goats, dogs, rabbits, and snails in her poetry. Her writing style is terse.

newsMedieval:
In the home of silver, and states unrest, 
There strikes a tune of discord, might I jest.
Yet wisdom warns, no simple plan can quell,
The argent strife that Argentina fell.

Like rabbits chased by hound 'cross earthen slew,
Stand Ukrainian, their numbers mightily few.
In the eastern mud, the Russians press their claim,
Their desires inked in blood, a ghastly game.

Snails on a border line, tension do create,
With threats and demand in Israel's contentious state.
Netanyahu, like a goat 'midst the fraught bleat,
Against the rising tide of Hezbollah, must meet.

feedItems.title: For Argentina, Dollarization May Work Better on YouTube Than in Reality
feedItems.description: Anarcho-capitalist President-elect Javier Milei is right that the country desperately needs dollars. But his economic plan for getting them may be the wrong one.

feedItems.title: Tired Ukrainian Troops Fight to Hold Back Russian Soldiers: 'They Come Like Zombies'
feedItems.description: Russia is taking heavy casualties in the mud of eastern Ukraine as it presses to encircle the city of Avdiivka.

feedItems.title: Israeli Military, Border Residents Press Netanyahu to Eliminate Hezbollah Threat
feedItems.description: The prime minister is resisting demands to take action at the Lebanon border, while issuing warnings to the Iran-backed army.

author.name: Brother Arnulfus
author.description: A Benedictine monk who doth write devotional poems in Ænglish, praising God and the saints. His poems are often humorous, short, and satirical. They often contain metaphors of alcohol, especially wine or ale.

newsMedieval:
Of Trump and his election woes, we oft heard tell,
His tongue stilled by court's order, yet he might farewell,
The case, he cries, 'tis a concocted hell,
Like vinegar to lips, a truth that doth not well sell.

In the shadow of steepled peaks, the belfry rings twice,
Wells Fargo workers rally, cast union's paradise,
Many a banker's brow with vexation is spiced.
As the toiling men's ale in solidarity is iced. 

Alas poor Bayer has taken a mean swig,
Shares have dipped like a drunkard's jig.
A potion of failure, their weedy trial gone big,
Ordered to pay a king's ransom, a bitter fig.

feedItems.title: An appeals court signaled that it would affirm but potentially narrow a gag order imposed on Trump in the criminal case alleging he conspired to overturn his 2020 election loss.
feedItems.description: An appeals court signaled that it would affirm but potentially narrow a gag order imposed on Trump in the criminal case alleging he conspired to overturn his 2020 election loss.

feedItems.title: Workers at two Wells Fargo bank branches launched unionization efforts, shifting attention of a resurgent labor movement to an industry that has historically been cool to it.
feedItems.description: Workers at two Wells Fargo bank branches launched unionization efforts, shifting attention of a resurgent labor movement to an industry that has historically been cool to it.

feedItems.title: Bayer shares fell sharply after the company stopped a late-stage study for a blood-thinning drug early because of lack of efficacy and was told to pay $1.56 billion in a lawsuit relating to its Roundup weedkiller.
feedItems.description: Bayer shares fell sharply after the company stopped a late-stage study for a blood-thinning drug early because of lack of efficacy and was told to pay $1.56 billion in a lawsuit relating to its Roundup weedkiller.
